ng-add.description: Adds Essential JS 2 specific Angular package to an application

accordion-default.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with default

accordion-html-template.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with html-template

accordion-multiple-expand.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with multiple-expand

accordion-nested.description: Create an Angular component with EJ2 undefined with nested

sidebar-backdrop.description: Create an Angular sidebar component with enable backdrop option.

sidebar-dock.description: Create an Angular sidebar component with enable docking feature.

sidebar-target.description: Create an Angular sidebar component with target option.

sidebar-types.description: Create an Angular sidebar component with different types.

tab-html-template.description: Create an Angular Tab component with HTML template

tab-icon.description: Create an Angular Tab component with an icon

tab-nested.description: Create an Angular Tab component with nested tabs

tab-popup.description: Create an Angular Tab component with popup mode

tab-scrollable.description: Create an Angular Tab component with scrollable mode

tab-vertical.description: Create an Angular Tab component with vertical orientation

toolbar-alignment.description: Create an Angular Toolbar component with alignment

toolbar-extended.description: Create an Angular Toolbar component with extended mode

toolbar-html-template.description: Create an Angular Toolbar component with HTML template

toolbar-multi-row.description: Create an Angular Toolbar component with multi-row mode

toolbar-popup.description: Create an Angular Toolbar component with popup mode

toolbar-scrollable.description: Create an Angular Toolbar component with scrollable mode

treeview-checkbox.description: Create an Angular TreeView component with checkbox

treeview-default.description: Create an Angular component with TreeView

treeview-draganddrop.description: Create an Angular TreeView component with drag and drop

treeview-multiselection.description: Create an Angular TreeView component with multi selection

treeview-nodeediting.description: Create an Angular TreeView component with node editing

treeview-remotedata.description: Create an Angular TreeView component with remote datasource

treeview-treetemplate.description: Create an Angular TreeView component with template
